posts.title: Laptop Feet Stand
posts.content: Avoid first degree burns when using your laptop for hours on end by keeping your skin cool with the laptop feet stand. Simply attach one foot stand at each end of the laptop and it will keep the bottom ever from making direct contact with your skin/killing your sperm count.

posts.title: WiFi Smart Scale
posts.content: Stay on top of your weight loss by tracking your progress on the WiFi smart scale. This high tech scale accurately tracks your weight, body fat, and BMI so you can upload them to your computer and create graphs that allow you to easily track your evolution.

posts.title: Palm Wax Candle Making Kit
posts.content: Learn a fun new skill by getting your hands on this palm wax candle making kit. The kit includes everything necessary to craft up to eight 100%  palm wax candles that you can infuse with scents like red pineapple, wildflower, and mango.

posts.title: Hair Catching Barber Cape
posts.content: Get ready for that hot date Friday night by keeping your soup bowl haircut looking fresh to def’ using this hair catching barber cape. The innovative design features a raised edge that catches all the falling hair strands before they hit the floor and create a mess.

posts.title: Machete Spatula
posts.content: Slice through anything that comes your way while manning the BBQ by grilling with this machete spatula. The solid oak handle provides a secure sturdy grip while the modified blade allows you to do everything from flipping a patty to opening a cold brewski.

posts.title: Sriracha Gumballs
posts.content: Set your mouth on fire next time your crave a little candy by popping one of these sriracha gumballs in your mouth. Each gumball packs a combination of sweet and fiery flavors that are sure to give your taste buds a kick you won’t soon forget.

posts.title: Star Wars Cookie Cutter Set
posts.content: Create out of this world treats that the kids will love using this Star Wars cookie cutter set. Each cookie cutter is made from BPA-free ABS plastic and comes in one of six different iconic characters from the film series like Yoda, Chewy, and Princess Leia.

posts.title: Reusable Zip Ties
posts.content: With versatility that rivals duct tape, the reusable zip ties are the household item you never knew you needed. Whether you need to tie a bag or bind objects together or organize cables, there’s no job they can’t preform – it’s rubber bands for the 21st century.

posts.title: Volcano Eruption Serving & Dipping Bowl
posts.content: Give your party snacks some extra curb appeal by serving them on this volcano eruption serving and dipping bowl. The clever design lets you create a disaster scenario where a small cottage is overrun by a spicy and delicious stream of salsa.

posts.title: Star Wars Collectible Stamps
posts.content: Commemorate your favorite Sci-Fi saga of all time with these Star Wars collectible stamps. The selvage includes the iconic movie logo with an intergalactic battle scene backdrop while the stamps display the artwork of famed Star Wars poster artist Drew Struzan.

posts.title: Steak Button Thermometer Set
posts.content: Elevate your grilling game by cooking your meat to perfection every time with help from the steak button thermometer set. The thermometer displays an easy to read gauge so you can easily know when your meat is rare, medium, or burnt to a crisp.

posts.title: Wireless TV Headphones
posts.content: Watch your favorite late night movies without waking up your significant other using these wireless TV headphones. They provide a comfortable fit, clear crisp sound, and feature a rechargeable battery that can go for 10 hours on a single charge.
